de.samdev.absgdx.framework.entities.colliosiondetection.geometries

Class CollisionGeometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.entities.colliosiondetection.geometries.CollisionGeometry
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CollisionBox, CollisionCircle, CollisionTriangle

    public abstract class CollisionGeometry
extends java.lang.Object
    A Collision Shape used in the CollisionMap. Common subclasses are CollisionBox and CollisionCircle

    • Field Summary

      the collision listener

      abstract float getXTouchDistance(CollisionBox other)
      Get the X-distance that this geometries and another can minimally have -> the other one is a CollisionBox (at this distance they don't intersect but touch) [!] The distance gets ShapeMath.FDELTA added so the no-intersection ruled is enforced
      abstract float getXTouchDistance(CollisionCircle other)
      Get the X-distance that this geometries and another can minimally have -> the other one is a CollisionCircle (at this distance they don't intersect but touch) [!] The distance gets ShapeMath.FDELTA added so the no-intersection ruled is enforced

      • getXTouchDistance

        public float getXTouchDistance(CollisionGeometry other)
        Get the X-distance that this geometries and another can minimally have (at this distance they don't intersect but touch) [!] The distance gets ShapeMath.FDELTA added so the no-intersection ruled is enforced
        Parameters:
        other - the other geometry
        Returns:
        the minimal x distance
